alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 1:54PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, northwestern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 245 PM EST... At 154 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beacon Square, or near Holiday, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Temple Terrace, New Port Richey, Lutz, Hudson, Holiday, Palm Harbor, New Port Richey East, Beacon Square, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Jasmine Estates, Land O Lakes, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Lake Magdalene and University. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for west central Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
